1.0.name: wordpress/inlinkz-linkup
1.0.description: InLinkz LinkUp is a widget that is inserted in your wordpress blog and allows you to receive link submissions from your readers. You are in total control of when the widget is available, how it is displayed and who is notified in the event of a submission.
